languages.text: "Клянусь самим Императором, я чиста пред вами — и душой, и помыслами!"

traits.locale_text: "Клянусь самим Императором, я чиста пред вами — и душой, и помыслами!"

languages.text: "I swear by the Emperor Himself, I am unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"
languages.original_text: "Клянусь самим Императором, я чиста пред вами — и душой, и помыслами!"

traits.locale_text: "I swear by the Emperor Himself, I'm unblemished before you in spirit or in thought!"
"I swear by the Emperor Himself, I'm unblemished before you in spirit or in thought!"
"I swear by the Emperor Himself, I'm unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"
"I swear by the Emperor Himself, I'm unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"
"I swear by the Emperor Himself, I am unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"
"I swear by the Emperor Himself, I am unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"

languages.text: 「皇帝陛下にかけて誓います。私は心も思考も、あなた様の前で一点の曇りもございません！」
languages.original_text: "I swear by the Emperor Himself, I am unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝陛下にかけて誓います。私は心も思考も、あなた様の前で一点の曇りもございません！」

languages.text: "İmparator Hazretleri üzerine ant içerim ki hem ruhum hem de düşüncelerim size karşı saftır!"
languages.original_text: "I swear by the Emperor Himself, I am unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator Hazretleri üzerine ant içerim ki hem ruhum hem de düşüncelerim size karşı saftır!"

languages.text: «¡Juro por el mismo Emperador que soy inmaculada en espíritu y pensamiento!».
languages.original_text: "I swear by the Emperor Himself, I am unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Juro por el mismo Emperador que soy inmaculada en espíritu y pensamiento!».

languages.text: “我以帝皇的名义发誓，在您面前，我的思想与精神都纯洁无瑕！”
languages.original_text: "I swear by the Emperor Himself, I am unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"

traits.locale_text: “我以帝皇的名义发誓，在您面前，我的思想与精神都纯洁无瑕！”

languages.text: « Je vous jure sur la tête de l'Empereur en personne que mon esprit est aussi pur que mes pensées ! »
languages.original_text: "I swear by the Emperor Himself, I am unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous jure sur la tête de l'Empereur en personne que mon esprit est aussi pur que mes pensées ! »

languages.text: "Ich schwöre beim Imperator Selbst, dass ich unbefleckt in Gedanken und Taten vor Euch stehe!"
languages.original_text: "I swear by the Emperor Himself, I am unblemished before you in spirit and thought!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich schwöre beim Imperator Selbst, dass ich unbefleckt in Gedanken und Taten vor Euch stehe!"
